Text: Fejute̩ mi, O O̩jo̩, todu uwe̩ omi chubiyo̩.
Omi ka ñw Jihofa kakini, Uwe̩ chʼOndu-mi;
I chʼe-abo kiafo̩ ku ma jʼile̩-i, ama chʼabo ku ma nʼuwohi e̩nyo̩,
E̩do̩dudu abo ku ma hika tʼo̩jo̩ omune̩ ubi anana nyo̩gba; nadʼiche̩bo̩ omi-ma e-e̩bie̩ le̩ wa n
Ugbo kʼanya je̩ ñw mi chʼuña ube̩-do̩;
Nakele Jihofa kʼi aña mi o̩na;
Omi du Jihofa gugu o̩gba-mi pioo;
Todule̩ e̩do̩-mi chʼe̩bo̩, oñ ojima-mi ayo̩;
Todu uwe̩ jʼatʼonugo-mi no̩ ñw o̩jegu n,
